title: TikTok Tax Information
description:
**Tax Time Reminder for TikTok Creators!**

Here’s what you need to know about accessing your 1099 tax forms:

**Where to Find Your 1099:**
Your 1099 tax form for 2024 earnings will be available in the TikTok app no later than 1/31/25. You can access it under Profile > Balance.

**What is a 1099?**
A 1099 is a tax form that reports income from non-employment sources, like your TikTok Shop and Creator Fund earnings. If you made $600 or more in 2024, you’ll receive one to file with your taxes.

Make sure to keep an eye out for your 1099 in your account.

title: TikTok Recharging!
description: Creators can not recharge on the app because its been removed from appstores but you can use the website to recharge. https://tiktok.com/coin

title: TikTok Is back online!
description: STATEMENT FROM TIKTOK: In agreement with our service providers, TikTok is in the process of restoring service. We thank President Trump for providing the necessary clarity and assurance to our service providers that they will face no penalties providing TikTok to over 170 million Americans and allowing over 7 million small businesses to thrive.  It’s a strong stand for the First Amendment and against arbitrary censorship. We will work with President Trump on a long-term solution that keeps TikTok in the United States.

title: TikTok To be Banned 8:30 PM EST
description: TikTok To go dark ahead of Jan 19th ban

title: TikTok has released a statement about Jan 19th
description:
TikTok Policy

@TikTokPolicy
Statement on Possible Shutdown

The statements issued today by both the Biden White House and the Department of Justice have failed to provide the necessary clarity and assurance to the service providers that are integral to maintaining TikTok's availability to over 170 million Americans. Unless the Biden Administration immediately provides a definitive statement to satisfy the most critical service providers assuring non-enforcement, unfortunately TikTok will be forced to go dark on January 19.

title: Scotus Upheld the TikTok ban, so now what?
description: Will the app actually go dark? We honestly won't know until Sunday Jan 19th. If it does we have a back up plan! Join Favorited and apply for our agency there! (We are not jumping ship from TikTok)

title: 🚨 Lawmakers Urge Biden & SCOTUS to Extend TikTok Ban Deadline 🚨

This development intensifies the ongoing debate surrounding national security, free speech, and economic repercussions. Stay informed on this evolving situation that affects creators and viewers alike.

title: 🚨 Important Announcement - TikTok Ban Updates
description:
ONLY IF THE BAN TAKES PLACE ON JAN 19th 2025 in the USA 1. We would recommend using a VPN and make sure to set it to CANADA to access TikTok and our network until further action is taken. This will allow you to continue using the app. Be sure to share this information with your viewers.

2. Using a VPN bypasses restrictions until the ban is reversed. (TikTok LTD is an American company, albeit owned by ByteDance, a Chinese entity, making a permanent ban unlikely.)

title: SCOTUS Votes on TikTok Ban set for 1/19/2025 Tomorrow
description: ⏰ The clock is ticking for TikTok, a beloved platform used by millions. On Friday, TikTok will stand before the Supreme Court in a crucial fight against the looming ban unless they sever ties with China. We at Infinitum_US remain hopeful for a positive outcome and stand in support of our community. 💖✨

title: Pray for The west coast
